name: Joint Entrance Examination Main
eligibility: 12th PCM
description: National-level engineering entrance exam for B.Tech/B.E. admissions.

name: Joint Entrance Examination Advanced
eligibility: Qualified in JEE Main among top 2,50,000 candidates with 12th PCM
description: National-level entrance exam for admission into Indian Institutes of Technology (IITs).

name: Birla Institute of Technology and Science Admission Test
eligibility: 12th PCM with minimum 75% aggregate in Physics, Chemistry, and Mathematics, and 60% in each subject individually
description: University-level entrance exam conducted by BITS Pilani for admission into its integrated first-degree programs in Engineering, Sciences, and Pharmacy.

name: Vellore Institute of Technology Engineering Entrance Examination
eligibility: 12th PCM with minimum 60% aggregate in Physics, Chemistry, and Mathematics (50% for reserved categories)
description: University-level entrance exam conducted by VIT for admission into B.Tech programs at its campuses in Vellore, Chennai, Bhopal, and Amaravati.

name: SRM Joint Engineering Entrance Examination
eligibility: 12th PCM with minimum 60% aggregate in Physics, Chemistry, and Mathematics
description: University-level entrance exam conducted by SRM Institute of Science and Technology for admission into B.Tech programs at its campuses.

name: Manipal Entrance Test
eligibility: 12th PCM with minimum 50% aggregate in Physics, Chemistry, and Mathematics
description: University-level entrance exam conducted by Manipal Academy of Higher Education (MAHE) for admission into B.Tech and other undergraduate programs.

name: National Eligibility cum Entrance Test (UG)
eligibility: 12th PCB with minimum 50% aggregate in Physics, Chemistry, and Biology (40% for reserved categories)
description: National-level medical entrance exam conducted by NTA for admission into MBBS, BDS, AYUSH, Nursing, and other undergraduate medical courses across India.

name: AIIMS B.Sc Nursing Entrance Exam
eligibility: 12th PCB with English and minimum 55% aggregate (50% for reserved categories)
description: National-level entrance exam conducted by the All India Institute of Medical Sciences (AIIMS) for admission into B.Sc (Hons) Nursing programs.

name: AIIMS B.Sc Paramedical Entrance Exam
eligibility: 12th with English and either PCB or PCM group, with minimum 50% aggregate (45% for reserved categories)
description: National-level entrance exam conducted by AIIMS for admission into B.Sc Paramedical courses such as Medical Technology, Radiology, Anaesthesia Technology, and other allied health sciences programs.

name: All India Forensic Science Entrance Test
eligibility: 12th with PCB or PCM from a recognized board with minimum 50% aggregate
description: A national-level entrance test for admission into B.Sc Forensic Science and related courses at participating universities across India.

name: Chartered Accountancy Foundation Examination
eligibility: Candidates must have passed Class 12 examination from a recognized board or equivalent.
description: The CA Foundation exam is the entry-level test conducted by the Institute of Chartered Accountants of India (ICAI) for students who wish to pursue a career in Chartered Accountancy.

name: Common Proficiency Test
eligibility: Candidates must have passed or appeared in Class 12 examination from a recognized board.
description: The Common Proficiency Test (CPT) was the entry-level examination conducted by the Institute of Chartered Accountants of India (ICAI) for Chartered Accountancy before it was replaced by CA Foundation in 2017.

name: Company Secretary Executive Entrance Test
eligibility: Candidates must have passed or be appearing in Class 12 examination from a recognized board.
description: The Company Secretary Executive Entrance Test (CSEET) is the mandatory qualifying test conducted by the Institute of Company Secretaries of India (ICSI) for registration into the CS Executive Programme. It evaluates aptitude in business communication, legal aptitude, economic and business environment, and current affairs.

name: Integrated Program in Management Aptitude Test
eligibility: Candidates must have passed Class 12 or equivalent examination with a minimum of 60% (55% for SC/ST/PwD). Students appearing in Class 12 are also eligible to apply.
description: The Integrated Program in Management Aptitude Test (IPMAT) is conducted by IIM Indore, IIM Rohtak, and other IIMs for admission to their 5-year Integrated Program in Management (BBA + MBA). It tests quantitative ability, verbal ability, logical reasoning, and general awareness.
syllabus: Written Ability Test / Personal Interview (later stages)

name: Common University Entrance Test
eligibility: Class 12th pass from a recognized board.
description: A national-level entrance exam for admission to undergraduate programs in central, state, deemed, and private universities across India, specifically for Arts and Humanities streams.
syllabus: Domain-specific subjects (e.g. Chemistry, Biology, Mathematics, Physics, History, Political Science, Sociology)

name: National Council for Hotel Management and Catering Technology Joint Entrance Examination
eligibility: Class 12th pass with English as one of the subjects.
description: A national-level entrance exam for admission to B.Sc. in Hospitality and Hotel Administration programs offered by Institutes of Hotel Management (IHMs).

name: National Institute of Design Design Aptitude Test
eligibility: Class 12th pass from any recognized board.
description: A two-stage national-level entrance exam for admission to Bachelor of Design (B.Des) programs at the National Institutes of Design (NIDs).

name: Undergraduate Common Entrance Examination for Design
eligibility: Class 12th pass from any recognized board.
description: A national-level entrance exam for admission to Bachelor of Design (B.Des) programs at IIT Bombay, IIT Delhi, IIT Guwahati, IIT Hyderabad, and IIITDM Jabalpur.

name: National Institute of Fashion Technology Entrance Exam
eligibility: Class 12th pass from a recognized board. (For B.F.Tech, PCM is mandatory).
description: A national-level entrance exam for admission to undergraduate design and technology programs at National Institutes of Fashion Technology (NIFT) campuses.

name: Common Law Admission Test
eligibility: Class 12th pass with a minimum of 45% marks (40% for SC/ST).
description: A national-level entrance exam for admission to undergraduate and postgraduate law programs offered by 24 National Law Universities (NLUs).

name: All India Law Entrance Test
eligibility: Class 12th pass with a minimum of 45% marks (40% for SC/ST).
description: A national-level entrance exam conducted by National Law University, Delhi (NLU Delhi) for admission to its undergraduate (BA LLB Hons.) and postgraduate law programs.

name: Symbiosis Law Admission Test
eligibility: Class 12th pass with a minimum of 45% marks (40% for SC/ST).
description: A common entrance exam for admission to undergraduate law programs at Symbiosis Law Schools in Pune, Noida, Hyderabad, and Nagpur.
